about.title: About
about.name: Name
about.text: My name is Leandro, i have been working with development and architecture for web in general approximately 8 years. My specialty is the back-end development with strong inclination to PHP, javascript and mobile too. I'm Graduated in Internet Systems by FIAP and I had technicial degree in Internet Systems. I started my career in digital agencies programming systems for the web. I worked as a Systems Analyst developing applications in PHP, NodeJs and C # .NET and I am currently a FullStack developer at the Education Development Foundation of SP and in my free time I am an eternal student of technology and I accept some frelas :)

fde.content:
At FDE, you can also analyze as a programmer with an emphasis on back-end Web applications in PHP and Mobile with React Native. I participate in the Integra project ( http://integra.fde.sp.gov.br ) which is part of FDE's internal management tools

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Docker, Linux, React Native, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Postgres, Sql Server, REST, LDAP, TFS, GIT

interaktiv.content:
At Interaktiv I got contact with software for the hospital area, such as the Philips TASY system used by the Oswaldo Cruz hospital. In this agency I participated in the projects: SABES ( https://sabes.org.br ), Self-care Toten, Nursing Assessment and Pre-anesthetic Assessment

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Docker, Linux, Electron, NodeJs, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Oracle 12C, Mysql, REST, JWT, TASY, GIT

knov.content:
Together with the Knov company I participated in the SigMe project ( http: // sigme .com.br ) which consists of a web vehicle tracking system written in PHP

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Linux, VueJs, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Mysql, Firebase , Socket IO, REST, JWT, GIT

psychemedics.content:
The company Psychemedics specializes in toxicological tests, from the sale to the issuing of medical reports, in this company I worked as a PHP developer with an emphasis on backend in the projects of Web panel for sale of tests in laboratories (E- B2B commerce - https://painel.exametoxicologico.com.br/auth/login ), E- B2C commerce of exams ( https://www.exametoxicologico.com.br ), Inside (Management reporting system)

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Lumen, Wordpress, Docker, Linux, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Mysql, REST, JWT, PHPUnit, Behat, ScriptCase, GIT

nacaodesign1.content:
At the agency Nação Design I was responsible for developing institutional websites in PHP using Laravel and Wordpress. In this agency I was able to participate in several projects, but the project that stood out the most was the website of the activist cycle Renata Falzoni "Bike é Legal" ( http://bikeelegal.com.br )

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Wordpress, MacOs X, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Mysql, GIT, Digital Ocean, Server Pilot

mds.content:
At the insurance broker MDS Insure I worked with programming and systems maintenance in C # and PHP (Wordpress). The project that stood out the most was the internal portal developed for international insurance policies in .NET and also the Intranet project using Wordpress.

Technologies: PHP, C #, .NET MVC, Entity Framework, Wordpress, Windows, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Mysql, SOAP, GIT

nacaodesign2.content:
The company Nação Design is a digital marketing agency, at that time I was responsible for developing institutional websites in pure PHP, html, css and javascript. I participated in several projects, but what most impressed me was the E-animals e-commerce ( https://eanimals.com.br/ ) developed in Wordpress

Technologies: PHP, Laravel, Wordpress, MacOs X, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Mysql, GIT , Digital Ocean, Server Pilot, cloudFlare

fiap.content: At FIAP college I was able to improve my knowledge in a lot of technologies like PHP, JAVA, C#, Android, IOS, Xamarin, React and many others. In addition to participating in competitions where I reached third position in the ranking with my team called "ACME" with the project "ENIAC"

uninove.content: At Nove de Julho University I was able to learn relevant programming concepts for the internet.

etec.content: At ETEC was where my interest in programming came from and since then my professional trajectory has been guided

one.p: Creation of smart web solutions for companies of all sizes and segments

two.p: Creation of intuitive, multi-platform mobile apps

three.p: Positioning, campaigns, optimization and dissemination of websites

four.p: Creation and administration of SEO and Analytics metrics for brand leverage

five.p: Creation of web and graphic visual identity in general

six.p: Maintenance and optimization of websites and web systems

contact.p: Fill out the form below and send me a message that I will contact you soon :)
